tasks.expression: (() => { const columnA = document.querySelector('#column-a'); const columnB = document.querySelector('#column-b'); const dataTransfer = new DataTransfer(); columnA.dispatchEvent(new DragEvent('dragstart', { dataTransfer: dataTransfer })); columnB.dispatchEvent(new DragEvent('drop', { dataTransfer: dataTransfer })); return 'Drag and Drop simulated with DataTransfer'; })()
